Statute.Title: Consumer-Driven Banking Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Services bancaires axés sur les consommateurs, Loi sur les)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2024, c. 17, s. 198 enacting ss. 1 to 20 of the Consumer-Driven Banking Act in force on assent, except,

Item.Text: — ss. 4 to 7, 12 and 13 come into force on a day or days to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 21 — Not in force
